text: Severe sugarcane smut outbreak reported in Maharashtra due to high humidity.
Leaf rust spreading rapidly in wheat fields of Punjab after continuous rain.
Banana bunchy top disease confirmed in Odisha districts this month.
Powdery mildew observed in barley fields of Himachal Pradesh following humid weather.
Tomato early blight detected in Andhra Pradesh due to excessive irrigation.
Rice blast cases increasing in Tamil Nadu after prolonged monsoon.
Citrus greening symptoms found in orange orchards of Karnataka.
Chili leaf curl disease spreading quickly in Telangana due to hot and dry conditions.
Late blight affecting potato crops in Shimla after repeated rainfall.
Maize downy mildew reported in parts of Bihar following high humidity and low temperature.
